parameters.name: RADIAL_DIST
parameters.description: The distance of the spacecraft from Mercury.

parameters.name: MSO_LOCAL_TIME
parameters.description: The Mercury longitude of the spacecraft.

parameters.name: MSO_LATITUDE
parameters.description: The Mercury latitude of the spacecraft.

parameters.name: MSGR_MSO_X
parameters.description: The X position of the spacecraft in the MSO frame.

parameters.name: MSGR_MSO_Y
parameters.description: The Y position of the spacecraft in the MSO frame.

parameters.name: MSGR_MSO_Z
parameters.description: The Z position of the spacecraft in the MSO frame.
